thread.section_title: DHgate 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 DHgate 的点评意见 | www.dhgate.com
thread.title: darren123

author: darren123
title: darren123
text:
Maybe been about 8years since I used dhgate last, spent thousands in the past, never had any issues, of course low end bulk electronics had a few issues but always expected. Just made an order again after so long, hope current and future sellers are as good as they once was.
I'm from U.K... delivery always arrived safely and in good time, expect even better now, will soon find out.
Always ask the seller any questions you have, keep it short and to the point they don't always have sufficient English skills but will always respond and be as helpful as possible.
prices seem to be slightly higher than some other china websites on dhgate, used to be the best, but expect a good search on here will show cheaper, also no harm in contacting the sellers for a better price.
